name: BOY73
description:
The year is 1973. Help him escape the abductor's apartment.

Movement:Arrow keys, WASD
Left-clickInteract / Confirm:Z, E, Space, Enter
Left-clickMenu / Cancel:X, Q, Shift, Esc
Right-click

** Many keyboard keys can be reassigned in the options menu. **

FPS meter:F2Stretch Mode:F3Full Screen:F4Refresh / Restart:
F5

"I don't care what it takes. They won't take you away from me."

[ Completion time: 30-50 minutes ]
[ Letter progress is automatically saved ]
